product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal Bike Shoe Toe Covers
long_description: Reach for these Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal bike shoe toe covers on cool days to keep your toes warm without the bulk of full length shoe covers. Soft-shell fabric provides superior water and wind protection for your toes. Interior delivers excellent moisture transfer, warmth and durability. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal bike shoe toe covers are recommended for road shoes with external cleats.
short_description: Reach for these Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal bike shoe toe covers on cool days to keep your toes warm without the bulk of full length shoe covers.
